name: uniMate
subtitle: Connect with your circle. Learn faster with friends you trust.
description: The official uniMate source for AltStore. uniMate helps students find housing, connect with others, and stay in their circle.

apps.name: uniMate
apps.subtitle: Find housing. Connect with your circle.
apps.localizedDescription:
uniMate is the student housing and social connection app. Find rooms, connect with trusted friends, manage contracts, and chat — all in one place.

Features:
• Browse student housing listings
• Chat with hosts and housemates
• Manage rental contracts
• Connect with your university circle
• Real-time notifications

versions.localizedDescription: Initial release of uniMate for iOS via AltStore.

privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: uniMate uses your camera to set your profile photo and upload listing images.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: uniMate accesses your photo library to select profile and listing photos.
privacy.NSUserNotificationsUsageDescription: uniMate sends notifications for new messages and housing alerts.
